main event: A civilian reported observing a white circular object approach the runway at Cold Bay AFS, Alaska, before accelerating down the runway and climbing out of sight.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 3 seconds,The object was circular and white in color,The observer was unable to determine the object's features as it moved too quickly,No other aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting,The object emitted a sustained bright light that was larger than typical runway lights.
witness description: A civilian working at Cold Bay Airport.
